attributes.action: Save Greaves Hall, Banks, Southport and to renovate the derelict land surounding it
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Greaves Hall in Banks, Southport (the former stately home and offices for thr mental institution has been left to decay and has had arson and vandals ruin parts of the building! something must be done to help with this building and save what is left! The building may not have long as deteriation and local people want it torn down as it looks an eye sore!
